reviews.title: Wire is too small
reviews.text: Bass preety good but the wire is a bit small in case of pulling out or some accident....it might cut it out easily,in this price range (1000-1300) JBL will be better

reviews.title: Worth every penny
reviews.text: This is the absolute beast in sound quality, it is just insanely incredible when it comes to the design and sound quality. Talking about sound everything is perfectly balanced highs mids and lows everything is just amazing im a bass lover but this product doesn't disappointed me the bass coming out from this tiny earphones are dope also if you need extra bass you can use equalizer but comparing the overall sound spec bass is just a tiny bit lower. But i strongly recommend this product to bass lovers because you will never get a better one on this price range with all the sound qualities i bet you.
